description: React component for a to-do list application with local storage persistence, filtering, and inline editing.

methods.name: createId
methods.description: Generates a reasonably unique id without extra dependencies.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new todo item with a unique id, title, and timestamp.

methods.name: toggleTodo
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a todo item by id.

methods.name: deleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a todo item by id.

methods.name: updateTitle
methods.description: Updates the title of a todo item; deletes if title is empty.
